borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of the size of the internal refuse storage areas, pursuant to Condition 8; details of the full postal address of the residential units to be created, pursuant to Condition 9; details of a scheme to ensure that all occupiers, other than those with disabilities who are blue badge holders, have no entitlement to parking permits from the council and to ensure that occupiers are informed, prior to occupation, of such restriction, pursuant to Condition 11; details of the cycle store fixtures/fittings to serve the areas shown for this purpose on the approved plans, pursuant to Condition 14; details of the Ultra-Low NOx Gas fired boilers to mitigate air pollution, pursuant to Condition 17 of planning permission reference: 2021/00253/FUL dated 1st April 2021.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Flat B 68 Bramber RoadLondonW14 9PB
